sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step"> <x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <applicaiton>Beacon</applicaiton> <assignment_group/> <detailed_description/> <expected_result>Should be able to see message in a basket called Provider Request</expected_result> <number>TS0003547</number> <order>32</order> <prep_step>false</prep_step> <state>draft</state> <sys_created_by>RBUSCH</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-07-19 21:24:51</sys_created_on> <sys_id>40b3e51bdbdf5b0040f8fcfa0c961961</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>RBUSCH</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-07-19 21:24:51</sys_updated_on> <test>Send In Basket message to Med Staff Pool for Provider Med Auth Status - in New Message dropdown, click Provider Request; message will be addressed to P MED STAFF; in Provider field search for existing provider, or leave blank; in CC field enter P SSCC Pharmacy OP infusion orders pool; mark as high priority; fill info into *** - will need to wait for provider security to be updated</test> <test_script display_value="TES0001019">bd8fd1d3dbdf5b0040f8fcfa0c961988</test_script> <testing_user>BCNRXCB</testing_user> </x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step> </record_update>
